Accounts.name: getAccountInfo
Accounts.description: Returns all information associated with the account of provided Pubkey

Accounts.name: getLargestAccounts
Accounts.description: Returns the 20 largest accounts, by lamport balance (results may be cached up to two hours)

Accounts.name: getMultipleAccounts
Accounts.description: Returns the account information for a list of Pubkeys.

Accounts.name: getProgramAccounts
Accounts.description: Returns all accounts owned by the provided program Pubkey

Accounts.name: getVoteAccounts
Accounts.description: Returns the account info and associated stake for all the voting accounts in the current bank.

Miscellaneous.name: getBalance
Miscellaneous.description: Returns the balance of the account of provided Pubkey

Miscellaneous.name: getClusterNodes
Miscellaneous.description: Returns information about all the nodes participating in the cluster

Miscellaneous.name: getHealth
Miscellaneous.description: Returns the current health of the node.

Miscellaneous.name: getIdentity
Miscellaneous.description: Returns the identity pubkey for the current node

Miscellaneous.name: getLeaderSchedule
Miscellaneous.description: Returns the leader schedule for an epoch

Miscellaneous.name: getMinimumBalanceForRentExemption
Miscellaneous.description: Returns minimum balance required to make account rent exempt.

Miscellaneous.name: getRecentPerformanceSamples
Miscellaneous.description:
Returns a list of recent performance samples, in reverse slot order. Performance samples are taken every 60 seconds and
include the number of transactions and slots that occur in a given time window.

Miscellaneous.name: getSignaturesForAddress
Miscellaneous.description:
Returns signatures for confirmed transactions that include the given address in
their accountKeys list. Returns signatures backwards in time from the
provided signature or most recent confirmed block

Miscellaneous.name: getSignatureStatuses
Miscellaneous.description: Returns the statuses of a list of signatures.

Miscellaneous.name: getSupply
Miscellaneous.description: Returns information about the current supply.

Miscellaneous.name: getVersion
Miscellaneous.description: Returns the current Solana version running on the node

Miscellaneous.name: requestAirdrop
Miscellaneous.description: Requests an airdrop of lamports to a Pubkey

Miscellaneous.name: getConfirmedSignaturesForAddress2
Miscellaneous.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0
Please use getSignaturesForAddress instead

Block.name: getBlock
Block.description: Returns identity and transaction information about a confirmed block in the ledger

Block.name: getBlockHeight
Block.description: Returns the current block height of the node

Block.name: getBlockProduction
Block.description: Returns recent block production information from the current or previous epoch.

Block.name: getBlocks
Block.description: Returns a list of confirmed blocks between two slots

Block.name: getBlocksWithLimit
Block.description: Returns a list of confirmed blocks starting at the given slot

Block.name: getBlockTime
Block.description: Returns the estimated production time of a block.

Block.name: getFirstAvailableBlock
Block.description: Returns the slot of the lowest confirmed block that has not been purged from the ledger

Block.name: isBlockhashValid
Block.description: Returns whether a blockhash is still valid or not

Block.name: getConfirmedBlock
Block.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0.
Please use getBlock instead

Block.name: getConfirmedBlocks
Block.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0
Please use getBlocks instead

Block.name: getConfirmedBlocksWithLimit
Block.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0
Please use getBlocksWithLimit instead

Block.name: getFeeCalculatorForBlockhash
Block.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0
Please use isBlockhashValid or getFeeForMessage instead

Block.name: getRecentBlockhash
Block.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0
Please use getLatestBlockhash instead

Epoch.name: getEpochInfo
Epoch.description: Returns information about the current epoch

Epoch.name: getEpochSchedule
Epoch.description: Returns the epoch schedule information from this cluster's genesis config

Fee.name: getFeeForMessage
Fee.description: Get the fee the network will charge for a particular Message

Fee.name: getRecentPrioritizationFees
Fee.description: Returns a list of prioritization fees from recent blocks.

Fee.name: getFeeRateGovernor
Fee.description: This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0

Fee.name: getFees
Fee.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0
Please use getFeeForMessage instead

Slot.name: getHighestSnapshotSlot
Slot.description: Returns the highest slot information that the node has snapshots for.

Slot.name: getMaxRetransmitSlot
Slot.description: Get the max slot seen from retransmit stage.

Slot.name: getMaxShredInsertSlot
Slot.description: Get the max slot seen from after shred insert.

Slot.name: getSlot
Slot.description: Returns the slot that has reached the given or default commitment level

Slot.name: getSlotLeaders
Slot.description: Returns the slot leaders for a given slot range

Slot.name: minimumLedgerSlot
Slot.description: Returns the lowest slot that the node has information about in its ledger.

Slot.name: getSnapshotSlot
Slot.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0
Please use getHighestSnapshotSlot instead

Inflation.name: getInflationRate
Inflation.description: Returns the specific inflation values for the current epoch

Inflation.name: getInflationReward
Inflation.description: Returns the inflation / staking reward for a list of addresses for an epoch

Stake.name: getStakeActivation
Stake.description: Returns epoch activation information for a stake account

Stake.name: getStakeMinimumDelegation
Stake.description: Returns the stake minimum delegation, in lamports.

Token.name: getTokenAccountBalance
Token.description: Returns the token balance of an SPL Token account.

Token.name: getTokenAccountsByDelegate
Token.description: Returns all SPL Token accounts by approved Delegate.

Token.name: getTokenAccountsByOwner
Token.description: Returns all SPL Token accounts by token owner.

Token.name: getTokenLargestAccounts
Token.description: Returns the 20 largest accounts of a particular SPL Token type.

Token.name: getTokenSupply
Token.description: Returns the total supply of an SPL Token type.

Transaction.name: getTransaction
Transaction.description: Returns transaction details for a confirmed transaction

Transaction.name: getTransactionCount
Transaction.description: Returns the current Transaction count from the ledger

Transaction.name: sendTransaction
Transaction.description: Submits a signed transaction to the cluster for processing.

Transaction.name: getConfirmedTransaction
Transaction.description:
This method is expected to be removed in solana-core v2.0
Please use getTransaction instead
